name: Path (Leaviant)
description:
Path

Path is a combination of a visual-novel story as well as a 2D platformer with various mechanics, such as portals. 

Taking place in a medieval fantasy setting, you follow the 'path' of Nexus, a young blacksmith apprentice who had just been disowned by his master in order for the young man to go and learn about the world outside of the village. This is a short tale of how a naive young man's entire worldview changes overtime since the moment he's left.

Scene Commands
  • R: Restart a level
  • S: Skip a scene or level
  • P: Return to the main menu
  • Space: Displays the next sentence in the dialogue
Player Controls
  • Arrow keys to move
  • Down arrow key: Use a portal or use the door to proceed to the next level
  • X: Switch characters in the level
  • C: Switch which platform is tangible (black or white platforms)
